commit message: Make use of the Android Annotations project
Replaced repeating alarm with custom rescheduling of single exact alarms. Fixes inexact behaviour on devices with KitKat or greater.
Added comment why WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE permission is still used.
Make sure only one alarm is registered at a time. Fixed alarm canceling logic.
Added script to print out alarms
Use issue front page placeholder for issues grid
Use confirmation dialog for removing issues instead of multiselect listener
Do not download over metered Wifi connections (tethering)
Use specific paper issue thumbnail in main view #18

Merge pull request #29 from notizklotz/materialwithoutdrawer

Implemented material design
Use default background color to improved settings legibility
Add touch feedback to issues grid
Shortened the wifi only setting summary
Use translucent footer to prevent grid items getting to high on lowres devices
